"Talis":
"A Talis is a long-range weapon that you can deploy by using one of its PAs. Once it's deployed, you can fire special bullets by casting Techniques.

The form it deploys in depends on which PA you use."

"The PA \"Perforated Shoot\" fires a Photon bullet, then deploys the Talis in a forward-facing form.

If you cast a Technique with the Talis deployed, the Talis will fire a Photon bullet with the same Attribute as that Technique."
